statements: DELETE FROM reasons_for_leaving WHERE employee_id = 101 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_turnover_rates WHERE id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM reasons_for_leaving WHERE employee_id = 50 AND reason = 'Relocation' AND date = '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Mentorship Program';
DELETE FROM employee_ratings WHERE employee_id = 101 AND performance_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM Employee WHERE emp_name = 'John Doe' AND start_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM TurnoverRate WHERE turnover_rate > 0.1 AND year = 2020;
